apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two individuals sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading. The medium and light skin tones are presented with naturalistic gradients, conveying warmth and a gentle blush that feels authentic to Apple's character designs. This representation of affection and romance is beautifully illustrated, making it a heartfelt way to express love and connection in digital conversations on Apple devices.
